Name: Mystery Solitaire. Powerful Alchemist 2
About the game: Return to the Middle Ages and become a powerful alchemist! This is a new sequel to the beloved game. In the game you will find 200 levels in 20 locations, for the passage of which you will receive unique potions. 200 levels is a lot of fun to play every day! The unique balance of the game and the complexity of the levels will allow you to enjoy the game and strain your mind. - Levels that are fun to solve - Solitaire card game - collect a chain of cards! - Colorful graphics and theme music - the perfect solitaire game! - Draw cards faster, thanks to the joker - increase the multiplier combo, Which gives you more coins! - Collect 15 alchemical solutions! - Original themed decks and 12 card shirt styles!
